title: Paktor - Swipe, Match & live Chat
description:
With more than 25million matches monthly, Paktor is the most popular random live chat and discovery app to meet new friends from all over the world.
> Swipe, instantly match, and enjoy live chat with Asian girls. (3G, 4G, WiFi)
> Reconnect with your matches anytime
> Absolutely safe and confidential. Simple and fuss-free, match across borders, and find cross-cultural relationships!
>  Dating feature to browse through singles from different ethnicities. Swipe right to like, left to pass. If someone likes you back, it's a match
> NEW voice bio function, that allows users to record a 15-second voice introduction to people viewing their profile
> NEW random chat function, that allows users to chat w random users who are active online
Enhance the experience with Premium Subscription:
> Choose gender and region preferences
> Unlock advanced filters to find perfect matches: job, education, height and countries/distances
> View "who liked me" to increase your chances of matching
> Receive daily points to send gifts and direct messages
----------------------------------------------------
We ask this permission to access the gallery so that the users can update their profile with their nice existing photos.
We cache the other user's photos in the external storage after the first load from the network in order to retrieve it faster next time. And also, this saves the network usage for the user.
We would like to use your current location to customize your experience and connect you to interesting people nearby.
When we ask for your camera and photos access, we want to help you create a perfect dating profile on Paktor.
We would like to access your phone country code as an ease of use for phone login.
We are building an enjoyable, clean and harmonious community, so any offensive behaviors or violations against terms of use will be taken seriously and result in the termination of your account.
Notice: additional fees may apply when using cellular data. We recommend using an unlimited data plan or Wi-Fi connection.

With more than 25million matches monthly, Paktor is the most popular random live chat and discovery app to meet new friends from all over the world.

We are building an enjoyable, clean and harmonious community, so any offensive behaviors or violations against terms of use will be taken seriously and result in the termination of your account.

Notice: additional fees may apply when using cellular data. We recommend using an unlimited data plan or Wi-Fi connection.
